titleLong: What Must Be Done: A 2D bullet hell game

images.description: The player starts out with a simple close-range scalpel weapon.
The player can unlock more exciting weapons after the gather resources.
A screenshot of the reward screen with some randomized upgrade options where the player can temporarily upgrade their character for the current run.
A screenshot of the reward screen with some other randomized upgrade options where the player can temporarily upgrade their character for the current run.
A screenshot of the research screen where the player can permanently upgrade their character between runs.
The walk animation for the doctor character the player controls.

videos.description: A gameplay video for What Must Be Done.
